description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for the home page of a recipe explorer app. It includes UI components for searching recipes, displaying recipe cards with images and details, handling API calls to fetch recipe data, and navigation to recipe details.

classes.name: HomePage
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the home page of the recipe application, allowing users to search and view recipes.

classes.name: _HomePageState
classes.description: State class for HomePage managing UI state, API calls, and user interactions.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, creates API client, and fetches initial data.

methods.name: _fetch
methods.description: Fetches recipes from the API based on a search query.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes resources like the search controller.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the home page UI.

methods.name: _buildList
methods.description: Builds the list view of recipe items or shows relevant messages.

methods.name: _chip
methods.description: Creates a small chip widget with an icon for recipe attributes.

methods.name: _tagChip
methods.description: Creates a chip widget for recipe tags.
